title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance to erase his criminal history by implanting an idea into a target's subconscious through shared dreams.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the chaos unleashed by the Joker as Gotham descends into madness, forcing him to question his limits as a hero.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts embarks on a mission to find a new habitable planet as Earth faces environmental collapse.

title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians engage in a fierce battle of wits and deception, pushing the boundaries of science and illusion.
